```{r}
library("knitr")
library("devtools")
url<-"https://plot.ly/~yihua/94.embed?width=550&height=550" 
plotly_iframe <- paste("<center><iframe scrolling='no' seamless='seamless' style='border:none' src='", url, 
    "/800/1200' width='800' height='1200'></iframe><center>", sep = "")
```
